text: God also brought all the wickedness of the people of Shechem back on their heads, for the curse of Jotham, son of Jerubbaal, overtook them.
Seeing that Alcimus was dead, Bacchides returned to the king, and the land of Judah was at rest for two years.
As they were proceeding on their journey someone said to him, “I will follow you wherever you go.”
